ingredients.item: 2 hake fillets (about 120g each), from the fish counter
250g frozen essential Waitrose Whole Leaf Spinach
400g can essential Waitrose Lentils, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6. Place the hake on a small baking tray, cover loosely with baking parchment and bake for 25 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the spinach in a saucepan with 1 tbsp water for 5-6 minutes or until defrosted. Stir in the curry paste and cook
for a minute, then add the lentils and heat through for 1-2 minutes.
Remove from the heat, stir in the yogurt and season to taste. Serve topped with the hake fillets.
